00107         FULL_WAKE_LOCK = WAKE_BIT_CPU_WEAK | WAKE_BIT_SCREEN_BRIGHT | WAKE_BIT_KEYBOARD_BRIGHT, 
00117         SCREEN_BRIGHT_WAKE_LOCK = WAKE_BIT_CPU_WEAK | WAKE_BIT_SCREEN_BRIGHT, 
00122         SCREEN_DIM_WAKE_LOCK = WAKE_BIT_CPU_WEAK | WAKE_BIT_SCREEN_DIM,

00154         ACQUIRE_CAUSES_WAKEUP = 0x10000000,
00155 
00165         ON_AFTER_RELEASE = 0x20000000
